Posts.Content: Hi I had breast cancer 6 yrs ago had a right mastectomy n was going to have a new boob made from my belly but unfortunately I got Ill turns out I have tumours pressing against my spine so surgery has been put on hold ☹️ Don’t know if I’ll ever have surgery now but I do miss having two  boob it’s just not the same n makes you feel ugly n no confidence, hope yours goes ok n having a nipple  tattood is fine I’ve seen pictures n honestly it looks ok  All the best  Sue
Posts.Title: Advised to have a mastectomy for DCIS after having a second opini...
